skillTree.name: Ambusher
skillTree.description: This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.

skillTree.name: Da Nasty Skulker
skillTree.description: Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: I'm Runnin!
skillTree.description: The more they're wounded, the faster a Gnoblar runs

skillTree.name: Grubbi's Dice Bag
skillTree.description: It's said that Grubbi won ten games of crook-dice in a row using these dice, and many Gnoblars claim he would have won several more if he wasn't torn apart by a mob of jealous comrades

skillTree.name: Red Stone
skillTree.description: Red Stones are extremely rare rocks that can be found in and along the Mountains of Mourn and Gnoblar Country. Occasionally a Gnoblar will be really lucky and not only find a Red Stone, but also manage to hang onto it without being mugged and killed.

skillTree.name: Big 'elm
skillTree.description: Gnoblar leaders like to wear large helms and hats, symbolizing their status and authority. This one is covered with spikes, horns, and tokens of good luck

skillTree.name: Stabbin Time!
skillTree.description: A Honcho fights better when there's other Gnoblars around... because he can let them take the hits while he stabs

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(own army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
